name: The Final Stand (itch) (thenoseofsauron)
description:
In my 2D shooter, I made these modifications:

- I reskinned all of the assets to have a more pixel art feel (except the earth, which already fit pretty well), including animated enemies, projectiles and player sprite.

- I added friendly space stations that serve as extra controllable firepower.

- I added an Earth which must be protected by preventing the force field around it from being destroyed by the aliens.

- I added a usable shield which you can toggle with right click to block attacks.

Credits:

Jacob Helzner

Pixelized stock space images taken from Pixabay.com
